mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.xsxh AS "xsxh", a.ksh AS "ksh", a.xm AS "xm", a.xb AS "xb", a.sfz AS "sfz", a.csrq AS "csrq", a.syd AS "syd", a.mz AS "mz", a.zzmm AS "zzmm", a.rxnf AS "rxnf", a.bynf AS "bynf", a.byrq AS "byrq", a.cxsy AS "cxsy", a.xqda AS "xqda", a.sfrx AS "sfrx", a.hkpcs AS "hkpcs", a.hkrx AS "hkrx", a.xlcc AS "xlcc", a.xz AS "xz", a.xxmc AS "xxmc", a.xsxy AS "xsxy", a.xszy AS "xszy", a.zyfx AS "zyfx", a.xsbj AS "xsbj", a.pyfs AS "pyfs", a.wpdw AS "wpdw", a.knslb AS "knslb", a.sfslb AS "sfslb", a.sjh AS "sjh", a.yx AS "yx", a.qqhm AS "qqhm", a.jtdh AS "jtdh", a.jtyb AS "jtyb", a.jtdz AS "jtdz", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bckj_biz_syb a
AND a.xsxh LIKE concat (#{xsxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.xm LIKE concat ('%',#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.sfz LIKE concat (#{sfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.syd LIKE concat ('%',#{syd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.zyfx LIKE concat ('%',#{zyfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.xz LIKE concat ('%',#{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.knslb LIKE concat ('%',#{knslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.cxsy LIKE concat ('%',#{cxsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.pyfs LIKE concat ('%',#{pyfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.xsxy LIKE concat ('%',#{xsxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.xszy LIKE concat ('%',#{xszy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.xsbj LIKE concat ('%',#{xsbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.mz LIKE concat ('%',#{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.zzmm LIKE concat ('%',#{zzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
AND a.ksh LIKE concat (#{ksh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_syb( owid, yh_Ref_Owid, xsxh, ksh, xm, xb, sfz, csrq, syd, mz, zzmm, rxnf, bynf, byrq, cxsy, xqda, sfrx, hkpcs, hkrx, xlcc, xz, xxmc, xsxy, xszy, zyfx, xsbj, pyfs, wpdw, knslb, sfslb, sjh, yx, qqhm, jtdh, jtyb, jtdz, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{xsxh}, #{ksh}, #{xm}, #{xb}, #{sfz}, #{csrq}, #{syd}, #{mz}, #{zzmm}, #{rxnf}, #{bynf}, #{byrq}, #{cxsy}, #{xqda}, #{sfrx}, #{hkpcs}, #{hkrx}, #{xlcc}, #{xz}, #{xxmc}, #{xsxy}, #{xszy}, #{zyfx}, #{xsbj}, #{pyfs}, #{wpdw}, #{knslb}, #{sfslb}, #{sjh}, #{yx}, #{qqhm}, #{jtdh}, #{jtyb}, #{jtdz}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.XM ,b.XSXH,a.SJH,a.SFZ,a.XB ,a.MZ,a.CSRQ ,b.XSBJ,b.XSZY,b.XSXY FROM BCKJ_BIZ_YHXX a LEFT JOIN BCKJ_BIZ_YHKZ b ON a.owid =b.yh_ref_owid WHERE a.owid=#{owid}
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_syb SET xz = #{xz}, syd=#{syd}, bynf=#{bynf}, jtdh = #{jtdh}, qqhm=#{qqhm} WHERE xsxh = #{xsxh}
UPDATE bckj_biz_syb SET ksh = #{ksh}, xsxh=#{xsxh}, zzmm=#{zzmm}, syd = #{syd}, jtdz=#{jtdz}, bynf=#{bynf}, jtyb=#{jtyb}, jtdh=#{jtdh}, xz=#{xz} WHERE yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}
UPDATE bckj_biz_syb SET bynf=#{bynf}, xsxh=#{xsxh}, xz=#{xz}, syd=#{syd}, jtdh = #{jtdh}, qqhm=#{qqhm} WHERE yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}
mapper.select:
select a.owid as owid , b.xsxh as xsxh ,c.ksh as ksh ,a.xb as xb , a.xm as xm , a.sfz as sfz , a.csrq as csrq , c.syd as syd , a.mz as mz ,c.zzmm as zzmm ,c.rxnf as rxnf , c.bynf as bynf ,c.byrq as byrq , c.cxsy as cxsy , c.xqda as xqda, c.SFRX as sfrx , c.HKPCS as hkpcs , c.HKRX as hkrx , c.XLCC as xlcc , c.XZ as xz ,d.xxmc as xxmc, b.xsxy as xsxy ,b.xszy as xszy, c.zyfx as zyfx , c.szbj as szbj, c.pyfs as pyfs , c.wpdw as wpdw , c.KNSLB as knslb , c.SFSLB as sfslb, a.sjh as sjh , a.yx as yx ,c.QQHM as qqhm , c.JTDH as jtdh ,c.JTYB as jtyb, c.JTDZ as jtdz,c.exp1 as exp1 from bckj_biz_yhxx a ,bckj_biz_yhkz b ,bckj_biz_syb c,bckj_biz_jyscheme d
a.owid = b.yh_ref_owid and b.xsxh = c.xsxh and b.xsxh = d.xsxh
and a.xm like CONCAT('%',#{xm},'%')
and c.zyfx like CONCAT('%',#{zyfx},'%')
and c.knslb like CONCAT('%',#{knslb},'%')
and c.pyfs like CONCAT('%',#{pyfs},'%')
and c.cxsy like CONCAT('%',#{cxsy},'%')
and c.xz like CONCAT('%',#{xz},'%')
and c.xlcc like CONCAT('%',#{xlcc},'%')
and b.xsxh like CONCAT('%',#{xsxh},'%')
and c.szbj like CONCAT('%',#{szbj},'%')
and b.xsxy like CONCAT('%',#{xsxy},'%')
and a.sjh like CONCAT('%',#{sjh},'%')
and c.zzmm like CONCAT('%',#{zzmm},'%')
and c.sfrx like CONCAT('%',#{sfrx},'%')
and c.ksh like CONCAT('%',#{ksh},'%')
and a.sfz like CONCAT('%',#{sfz},'%')
and a.mz like CONCAT('%',#{mz},'%')
and c.syd like CONCAT('%',#{syd},'%')
order by xsxh asc
select bynf from bckj_biz_syb where xsxh=#{xsxh}
select bynf as bynf from bckj_biz_syb where sfz=#{sfz}
select yh_ref_owid as yhOwid,sfz as sfz FROM BCKJ_BIZ_SYB

SELECT b.dic_Val2 as dicVal2 FROM OURWAY_SYS_DIC a ,OURWAY_SYS_DIC_VALUE b
a.owid=b.dic_ref_owid
a.type=#{type}
and b.dic_val2 LIKE concat(#{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ESCAPE '&'
order by b.dic_val2 limit 20
